original: 博陵安平人，崔烈之子。與諸葛亮、徐庶友善。諸葛亮躬耕隴畝，隱居不出，聲名未顯時，常常自比於管仲、樂毅，唯有崔州平、徐庶認可其才。
text: Boring Anping, the son of Cui Lie. Friendly with Zhuge Liang and Xu Shu. Zhuge Liang cultivated long acres and lived in seclusion. When his reputation was not obvious, he often compared himself to Guan Zhong and Le Yi. Only Cui Zhouping and Xu Shu recognized their talents.
